column1: Little Goat Diner////I am embarrassed to say we "settled" on this place as a backup plan because there was nothing  to second guess about it.  At the height of the lunch rush
column2: our hostess was pleasant without being bothered by the same old questions.  It was at least a 30 minute wait but that was to be expected.  We lucked out and  scored a bar seat when ordering drinks.  The bartenders were so nice to talk to about baseball
column5: they engaged in conversation and I liked that!  The Vandermill cider was so delicious-clear
